cps.server.database

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cps.server.database.DatabaseController

  • public class DatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages database-related operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DatabaseController.DatabaseAction
      Used to run a user-specified action with an SQL connection as parameter.
      static interface  DatabaseController.DatabaseQuery<T>
      Used to receive a database query as a lambda function The query runs some code (specified in the body of the lambda function) and then returns a result of the generic type T.
      static interface  DatabaseController.DatabaseQueryWithResponse<T>
      Used to receive a database query as a lambda function The query runs some code (specified in the body of the lambda function) and then returns a result of the generic type T.
      static interface  DatabaseController.ResultVisitor<R>
      Is used to receive a lambda function that creates an entity object or returns some result from an SQL ResultSet as parameter.
      static interface  DatabaseController.StatementVisitor
      Is used to receive a lambda function that fills the fields of a PreparedStatement.
